Lib

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
va<- read_csv(here("data", "raw_data", "qpcr", "va", "va_daily_monthly_inh.csv"))
```

# Clean

#### Remove NTC

```{r}
va<-
  va %>%
  filter(!Sample %in% "NTC")
```

# Plot

```{r}
va %>%
  ggplot() + geom_boxplot(
    aes(x = Sample,
        y = Cq))+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 26.93) +
  theme_bw()+ 
  labs(title = "Va Inhibition")

```

**No inhibition here**
